item.title: LeetCode 1356. Sort Integers by The Number of 1 Bits 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 依照 1 bits 出現的次數排序。

item.title: LeetCode 217. Contains Duplicate 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 檢查陣列中是否有出現重複的值。Return if any value appears at least twice in the array.

item.title: LeetCode 350. Intersection of Two Arrays II 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 檢查兩個 array 中相同的元素。Return elements must appear as many times as it shows in both arrays

item.title: LeetCode 88. Merge Sorted Array 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 將兩個已經排序過的 array 合併。Merge nums1 and nums2 into a single array sorted in non-decreasing order.

item.title: LeetCode 1502. Can Make Arithmetic Progression From Sequence 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 檢查連續數組間是否存在相同的大小規則。Check if the difference between any two consecutive elements is the same.

item.title: LeetCode 976. Largest Perimeter Triangle 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 以現有長度組合出最大面積的三角形。Return the largest perimeter of a triangle with a non-zero area, formed from three of these lengths.

item.title: LeetCode 1051. Height Checker 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 給一個未經排列的整數 array，請給出排序前後位置不同的個數總和。You are given an unsorted integer array. Return the number of indices where heights[i] != expected[i].

item.title: LeetCode 414. Third Maximum Number 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 給一個未經排列的 array，請給出「倒數第三大」的數值。Given an integer array nums, return the third distinct maximum number in this array.

item.title: LeetCode 561. Array Partition I 解題紀錄
item.author: Elvire
item.description: 計算 input array 中任意兩數 $min$ 後的 $max$ 值。Return the sum of $min(a_i, b_i)$ for all $i$ is maximized.
